title: Time Magician

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Send someone back in time at night.
-Once per game, revive a dead Pale Moon.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If they die the same night you send them back in time, their death Is delayed for 2 rounds
-If they are attacked again while their death Is delayed, they will die.
-You will revive a dead Pale Moon as a completely lifeless zombie. They cant be voted, talked or whispered to. You may decide to give this Zombie to yourself or any other Pale Moon.
-If someone attacks a target with a Zombie, the Zombie will die instead.
-When the PMCS begins, you will gain two charges of revival, and may revive any player. They still cannot be talked, voted or whispered to, nor can they get targeted at night, but you will use them to deal an Astral Unstoppable Attack at a player. If you dont, you will still give them to yourself or another Pale Moon member.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You have decided to send someone back in time."
"You have decided to revive Player Name as your Zombiel/Ghoul."
"You were attacked but your death was delayed by a time magician!"
"You were attacked while your death was delayed. You have died!"
"Player Name was revived as the Time Magician's Zombie/Ghoul!"
"You were attacked by the Time Magician's Ghoul!"
"...They were killed by the Time Magician's Ghoul."

desc:
Post 668
*The only Pale Moon member with actual magic.*
